20101206164849.500|20101206164850.750|CCO|CAN BE DONE.

20101206164852.000|20101206164853.800|CCO|FLUSH, BECAUSE THAT WILL CAPTURE
20101206164853.800|20101206164855.600|CCO|MOST OF THE AIR FLOW AND MIST

20101206164857.400|20101206164859.200|CCO|THE OTHER THING THAT CAN BE 
20101206164859.200|20101206164901.000|CCO|DONE -- THOSE BACTERIA ARE GOING

20101206164904.333|20101206164906.000|CCO|BEFORE YOU FLUSH, BECAUSE WHEN 
20101206164906.000|20101206164907.667|CCO|THEY HIT THE TOP, THEY'RE GOING 
20101206164907.667|20101206164909.333|CCO|TO COME IN CONTACT WITH THE 
20101206164909.333|20101206164911.000|CCO|DISINFECTANT.
